duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct tax interviews with clients face to face and through virtual tools – video, phone, chat, email.
Inspire confidence in clients by preparing complete and accurate tax returns.
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Provide clients with IRS audit support.
Mentor and collaborate with teammates in a supportive environment.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field. CPA or Enrolled Agent certification.
